steps.name: Collateral Balance
steps.content: This function provides the current balance of a specific collateral asset associated with a given account within the protocol.

steps.name: Borrow Collateralization
steps.content: By evaluating the borrow collateral factors, this function determines whether an account possesses sufficient collateral to maintain a non-negative liquidity position.

steps.name: Liquidity Check
steps.content: It also evaluates whether an account has adequate liquidity to increase its borrow position in order to prevent users from entering unsustainable borrowing positions.

steps.name: Minimum Borrow Balance
steps.content: This function establishes the minimum borrow balance allowed in the base asset for an account. It ensures that users initiate borrow transactions with a minimum threshold, contributing to the stability and security of the protocol.
